ygData.subject: RoK info (mild spoilers!)
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I won t spoil it too much for you guys but Kunark is AWESOME: Rejoice you are a bard because it is mammoth in scale and its mostly outdoors.  I simply
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I won't spoil it too much for you guys but Kunark is AWESOME:
Rejoice you are a bard because it is mammoth in scale and its mostly
outdoors. I simply cannot tell you how happy I am, btw, that we have charm
back again. =)

New Songs:
Selos51 is broken of course, you get invis/see invis/lev but no speed.
Everything sees invis anyhow but trust me, you'll want lev.

Now, on to the good stuff:
Our armor is Singing Steel, neon green plate - like Hero Bracer type green
not drab ranger green. Yes Tork is sporting Singing Steel and loving it.
;)


New weapons! New graphics! LOTS of new stuff!

I got dawnchaser (first one on Nameless) this weekend, last night I got a
near godly piercing weapon: Sacrdioan's (sp) Partisan! That time spent
with the ol' obsidian shard to get to 200 was worth it - I'm a regular
pigsticker with the new shoulder armor... um nevermind... =)

-Tork@Nameless
